byline.contributor: Les Neuhaus contributed reporting from Orlando, Fla.

headline.print_headline: A Secret Too Important to Be Kept
headline.main: A Secret Relationship, Until Mom and Dad Needed to Know

snippet: The bride’s parents insisted that their daughter not marry outside their tight-knit ethnic and cultural circle.
lead_paragraph: The bride’s parents insisted that their daughter not marry outside their tight-knit ethnic and cultural circle.
